New in version 1.1

  • Added a feature to immediately upload screenshots without them appearing on the desktop at all.
  • Press Cmd+Alt+Shift+3 to take a screenshot and upload it.
  • Press Cmd+Alt+Shift+4 to take a snipping screenshot and upload it.

New in version 1.0

  • Added "Recent Uploads" menu
  • Added "All Uploads" window
  • Added animation while uploading.
  • Added automatic updating via Sparkle.
